attributes.action: Set up a public enquiry into Children's Services needless removal of children
attributes.additional_details:
Its all over facebook
UTube
Panorama
Dispatches
attributes.background:
76.000 Children have been removed from families in the last year 
Many on the grounds of Future emotional harm
Many on unsubstanciated significant risk of harm
Many minutes after birth
How much longer are the good people of the uk going to allow this to keep happening till theirs are taken

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
